description: Giant reed (Arundo donax) is an amazing example of nature's beauty. Its impressive height of up to 25 feet with slender stems gives it a majestic quality. Its leaves are deep green and are reminiscent of bamboo though the stems are much thicker. The broad blades are a sight to behold, and when the wind blows through them, the rustling of the leaves is a calming sound. Giant reed is an excellent choice for areas, as its drought resistance and hardiness make it an incredibly durable species, ensuring you enjoy its beauty for many years to come.
